title: Flipped Learning-Based Science Learning Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and experimental methodology comprehension
context.additional_context: Combining digital device-based pre-learning materials with in-person classes focused on discussions/experiments

learning_goals: Learners can explain key concepts after pre-learning 90% or more of video lectures and reading materials provided in the flipped learning model.
Learners successfully complete 80% or more of tasks applying scientific thinking skills through discussion, problem-solving, and experimental activities in face-to-face classes.
Learners can articulate the positive impact of flipped learning on learning motivation and comprehension via a post-course survey.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
